snippet: Working with onetime protégées of the stylist Rachel Zoe, the actress will occasionally stray from the French house and wear Ralph Lauren or Schiaparelli.
abstract: Actress Jennifer Lawrence, who is up for three Critic's Choice Awards for her roles in movies Joy and The Hunger Games: Mockingjay Part 2, appears to be experimenting with different styles on the red carpet.
lead_paragraph: Working with onetime protégées of the stylist Rachel Zoe, the actress will occasionally stray from the French house and wear Ralph Lauren or Schiaparelli.

headline.print_headline: Edgy Performances  With Dresses to Match
headline.main: Jennifer Lawrence Is a Darling of Dior
